cta.title: Experience Unlimited Diamonds and Fast Progress
cta.description: You can use quick commands to get everything, seize the opportunity to crush the Blackguard!
cta.editorDescription: Damn it! Which traitor shut down my base editor? Don't worry, let Candou take care of it! You can use our web editor to create unique epic maps and strike fear into those commanders!

commands.title: Command Tool
commands.subtitle: Select command type to quickly generate game commands
commands.step1Desc: Choose the command category you need from the tabs above
commands.step2Desc: Choose a specific command from the dropdown menu
commands.step3Desc: Click the copy button and paste it in the game chat

maps.title: Glorious Memories
maps.description: Since the base editor went online, we have witnessed countless collisions of creativity and strategy. Each custom base carries the wisdom of commanders, and every defensive layout showcases unique tactical thinking. Thank you for your passion and creativity in strengthening the Blackguard defense system.

creative.title: More Creative Elements!
creative.description: You can always imagine limitlessly what surprises Candou can bring you.

downloads.title: Download
downloads.subtitle: Get the client from the options below

footer.description: Unofficial Boom Beach private server with unlimited resources and unique gameplay
footer.author: Candou
footer.disclaimer: This is an unofficial fan project, not affiliated with Supercell
